title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Turn chilly rooms into cozy retreats in seconds with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat. Designed for comfort and convenience, this ETL-certified ceramic heater delivers rapid, even warmth with advanced PTC technology—feel the heat in as little as 2 seconds. Choose your perfect setting with three intuitive modes: 750W for energy-saving warmth, 1500W for powerful heat, or fan-only for year-round air circulation.

Compact yet capable, its 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13" footprint and 2.6 lb weight make it easy to move from dorm to office to kitchen. Enjoy peace of mind with built-in overheat protection and tip-over auto shutoff at 45 degrees. The whisper-quiet operation (below 45 dB) keeps your space serene—perfect for work, study, or sleep. An adjustable thermostat helps maintain your ideal temperature while saving energy, and the sleek black design blends seamlessly with any décor.

Why you’ll love it:
- Fast, efficient heating: PTC ceramic warms up in 2 seconds.
- Flexible comfort: 3 modes—750W, 1500W, and fan-only.
- Safety first: ETL certified, overheat protection, and 45° tip-over auto-off.
- Ultra-portable: Lightweight and compact for easy placement.
- Quiet comfort: Under 45 dB for undisturbed focus or rest.
- Ideal coverage: Perfect for bedrooms, dorms, offices, and kitchens (up to ~200 sq. ft).

Stay warm, stay safe, and stay focused—anywhere you plug in—with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater.
